title: Raw Garden - TC Spice
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, European
description: Its 2nd outlet, est. 2014. Menu is approximately 50% raw vegan food and 50% cooked vegan food. Has fresh juices, smoothies, and wheat grass shots along with desserts cakes and sweets. Honey is used at times and also for sale.
